description: PAL record parameters from WINNF-TS-0245 Version V1.0.0

palId.description: PAL-ID of this PAL database record. Format: pal/$MO-$YEAR/$FIPS/$CHANNEL

licensee.description: Human-readable name of the PAL licensee

userId.description: User Identifier (UR-ID) of the PAL licensee. This is used by CBSDs requesting PAL spectrum grants from SAS to identify which PAL licensee they are operated by

registrationInfo.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

registrationDate.description: Date of licensee FCC registration in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

licenseConditions.description: Human-readable string or reference annotating the certification

callSign.description: call sign of the licensee (as assigned by FCC)

licenseInfo.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

licenseDate.description: Start date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

licenseExpiration.description: Expiration date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

licenseAreaIdentifier.description: Human-readable string or reference denoting the license area (e.g. FIPS census tract code)

licenseAreaExtent.description: Reference to a record in a geographical database represented as a SAS-SAS Zone record providing the extents of the license area. (e.g. “zone/census_tract/census/$YEAR/$FIPS”)

licenseFrequencyChannelId.description: FCC-supplied identifier for the frequency channel for the PAL
